com.paydiant.android.ui.service.transaction

Interface IProcessPaymentListener

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IProcessSplitPaymentListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ProcessPaymentListenerAdapter

    public interface IProcessPaymentListener
    The listener interface for receiving IProcessPaymentService operation callbacks. In order to register for callback events, an instance of this would needed to be set through the IProcessPaymentService.setProcessPaymentListener(IProcessPaymentListener) method. This must be set before invoking any of the service operations.

    Note: App developers are encouraged to use the ListenerAdapter implementations whenever possible as the Listener interfaces might get updated with new functionality/methods from one SDK release to the other. Therefore using a ListenerAdapter will make sure that there wont be any compilation issues due to unimplemented methods during a SDK upgrade.

    Author:
    Paydiant Inc.
    See Also:
    ProcessPaymentListenerAdapter
